item.title: Down Syndrome associated Alzheimer disease (DSAD) and autosomal dominant AD (ADAD)
item.description: AUTHORS: Agnès Pérez-Millan, Sergi Borrego-Écija, Anna Antonell, Beatriz Bosch, Neus Falgàs, Núria Guillén, Jordi Juncà-Parella, Laura Molina-Porcel, Albert Lladó, Mircea Balasa, Antonio Boza-Serrano, Raquel Sánchez-Valle TITLE: Galectin-3 is upregulated and correlated with MRI findings in Autosomal Dominant Alzheimer’s Disease and Genetic Frontotemporal Dementia CONFERENCE: Down Syndrome associated Alzheimer disease (DSAD) and autosomal dominant AD (ADAD) PLACE: Barcelona, Spain DATES: April 11 - 12, 2024
